achievements.title: Casual reader
achievements.desc: Read 100 manga. Looks like reading doesn't hurt.

achievements.title: Bookworm
achievements.desc: Read 200 manga. Sitting in your comfortable chair, reading favorite Korean comics. This is bliss.

achievements.title: Dat scent
achievements.desc: Read 300 manga. There's nothing better than the smell of freshly opened book. Or a PDF.

achievements.title: Where do I put these?
achievements.desc: Read 400 manga. Consider investing in another bookshelf, or you'll be swimming in books soon.

achievements.title: Half a grand
achievements.desc: Read 500 manga. Now think of what kind of person you'd be if you didn't start reading manga then. On that particular day...

achievements.title: Read or die
achievements.desc: Read 750 manga. You managed to make a bow out of paper, but remember that cellulose fibers don't work well as a bulletproof shield.

achievements.title: Librarian
achievements.desc: Read 1000 manga. You work with books, right? Right?

achievements.title: The floor is books
achievements.desc: Read 1500 manga. Sleeping on books must be pretty... hard?

achievements.title: Still not enough
achievements.desc: Read 2500 manga. In search for the perfect story you've read six lifetimes worth of words. Did you find it?

achievements.title: Sleep deprivation
achievements.desc: Read 5000 manga. Think of all the mangakas and writers that couldn't sleep just to make this moment happen.

achievements.title: Reincarnation
achievements.desc: Read 7500 manga. How, exactly? This is not possible for normal humans.

achievements.title: I've seen it all
achievements.desc: Read 10000 manga. Ten. Thousand. Manga. An average user's list is shorter than your list of titles starting with "A" alone.
